events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized as a refund request due to the wrong item being delivered.
Your case has been assigned to one of our refund specialists who will assist you shortly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item that arrived yesterday.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and send you a prepaid label to return the wrong item.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and resolving this issue efficiently.
Your refund has been processed and you should see the amount return to your account within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I have received the refund today. Thank you very much for your help and prompt service!
We are glad to hear your refund was successful. Closing this case now and feel free to reach out anytime.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund experience.
